resources.string:
Using the Augmented Reality(AR) Room Design application users can see 
how a furniture of their choice is suitable around the room and can experience in real the actual view of the furniture located in the room. This applications supports Google ArCore technology.



Key Features:


1. Select furniture from catalogue to view
 			 how it looks in your room.
 2. You can also move around the 
 			 furniture.
 3. You can also click the screenshot and
 			 save.
 4. This app set the 3D depth and place 
 			 the object accordingly in real world.



Developer Name:


1.Jahid Hasan
Software Engineering,SUST. 
2.Hasan Ali
Software Engineering,SUST.
